title: They just made the GP nerf on PBE even worse lol

embed.description: The PBE has been updated! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning: PBE Content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers! Manage your expectations accordingly. ) ! * *: The PBE is a testing grounds for new, tentative, and sometimes radical changes.

body:
Now his Q is gonna give less gold, AND take more time to get 500 S.S

This really is overkill. Why not just go through with the previous idea of changing his barrels to BONUS ARMOR PEN.

The current nerfs are going to A: Lower his income, B: Lower his ult power, and C: Destroy his current build path.

replies.body:
Just remove the interaction between Q and Grasp, which is what makes him unfair in laning, and he'll be super fine. More risk to get good trades, his laning phase will be much harder and he'll stay as a lategame champion. No need to nerf everything before realizing the problem and then when they'll finally remove the interaction cause they ran out of ideas he'll suck.

Actually, make his Q count as a ranged autoattack. That way, Grasp will be divided by 2 (cf. tooltip) and Bandit will give 3 gold instead of 10. I think that'd be a really good idea. And revert the other nerfs.

I agree with this. 

Change Q to ranged, possibly change barrels to bonus pen, and if that doesn't work, THEN look at his gold gain. Gutting his ability to use barrels in teamfights, AND his gold gain at the same time is a really bad idea. It doesn't matter if his barrels ignore total armor if he cant use them anymore.
Chaning his e to  bonus armor pen wouldn't do anything.

This is a pretty bad argument. 

First off, you didnt provide any points to back up your claim. Second, you're flat out wrong. There is a huge difference between total armor and bonus armor.  

If changing something from total armor to bonus armor doesn't do anything, explain why assassins were hurting so bad after {{item:3035}} changes?  I'm very curious.

> [{quoted}](name=Rinky Dinky,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0R2Q9Fqr,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-02-13T01:58:39.062+0000)
>
> This is a pretty bad argument. 
> 
> First off, you didnt provide any points to back up your claim. Second, you're flat out wrong. There is a huge difference between total armor and bonus armor.  
> 
> If changing something from total armor to bonus armor doesn't do anything, explain why assassins were hurting so bad after {{item:3035}} changes?  I'm very curious.

If he buys a dominiks  he still deals true damage to everything and he will still 1 shot squishys

changes to LW had no effect as assassins just stack armor pen and buy BC.

That requires him to actually build an armor pen item, which I would argue is very important to consider.

That's one less crit item he can buy, and even if he purchases it, that still only shreds bonus armor.

In fact, the penetration stacks differently than you think. It would be a % of a %.

A tank with 400 armor would still have around 150 at least in that situation.
His gold income is going to be lower, but his silver serpent farming will be the same as live in that PBE iteration

You gotta think about the butterfly effect. Less gold means slower powerspikes. Slower powerspikes can have very big impacts on certain champions. For example, GP relies on having a certain amount of items in order to clear waves with the barrels effectively. Reducing his gold gain is going to, by cause and effect, reduce his S.S farm, by delaying his ability to instaclear waves with barrels, which will effectively increase the amount of time it takes to purchase ult upgrades. 

On top of this, his E is being nerfed in a way that also makes it very inefficient to even use barrels to farm waves, as now he can only hold 3 at a time. Top this off with no compensation, his barrels having a delay... etc.

Take into account nerfing his gold gain, while nerfing his barrels at the same time, will also destroy his ability to come back in a game. GP is very weak in lane. He has bad trades with anyone who can all in him early, and many champs will reach powerspikes before him. These nerfs will seriously hurt his ability to come back in a game, which he needs in order to function. 

All of these nerfs at once are far too much.

His SS income, compared to his ult cost, shouldn't be any different, than it is now. So I don't see how it will affect his ult. (considering the damage against minions isn't changed, so he doesn't even affect his farm game.

As for his current build path, I'm guessing Riot has decided that he should Hyper carry, and is simply getting their too fast. Considering he builds Glass cannon so that he can do a ton of damage with his barrels, and chunk out any squishy.
